DICTIONARY, 

ENGLISH AHD HINDUSTANI. 



THE READING OF THE HINDUSTANI WORDS BEING GIVEN IN ROMAN CHARACTERS, OR OCCASIONALLY 

REFERRED TO BY THE NUMBERS OF THE COLUMNS WHERE SUCH WORDS ARE 

TO BE FOUND IN THE PRECEDING PART. 



A few Hindustani verbs being of most frequent recurrence, will be represented by the Italic letters corresponding to their 
initials : thus, li^Jb hond, to be, by h. \ \i\s^jjnd, to go, by^. ; Ij^i karnd, to do, by k. \ li.O dend, to give, by d.
